file_content.text: I have to go. The sooner I'm back on Coruscant, the better.
I don't want to talk to you, I want to leave!
Is it safe, now? Are all of the bombs shut down?
We're good to go, Senator.
Yes, sir.
Good.
I don't know about "safe," but the bombs are disabled.
More or less.
You know that's what I meant. I'm not a fool.
Walk through the door and find out.
Test them and see.
You can't even save a life without being disrespectful and childish. Pitiful.
Get on with it, Lieutenant. We've still got to get out of this disgusting place. Go on, lead the way.
Get me out of here!
Who the--oh. You. I should've known Garza would try to keep all of this inside her twisted little family. Well, don't just stand there.
You know how to defuse bombs, don't you? Wraith said they'll explode if I leave the room. She has a remote detonator, too, so be quick.
Don't worry, sir, I'm going to get you out of here.
Stay calm.
I am not a child to be comforted, Lieutenant.
Can you tell me what she's planning?
What is Wraith's goal?
This is how you treat your rescuer?
Nice to see you, too.
Rescuer. Ha. You aren't here out of the goodness of your heart, you're here because Garza sent you here. Through gritted teeth, I imagine.
That traitor was going to force me to go on record saying the Senate officially abandoned Havoc Squad on Ando Prime!
Do you have any idea what the recording was for?
She wanted to record you?
Is it not obvious?
I wouldn't mind knowing why you abandoned Havoc myself.
Why did you do it, anyway?
Havoc abandoned us. They invaded Ando Prime and incited a massive, armed response from the Empire.
Oh, no. Telling the truth? That must've been horrible for you.
Are you joking?
This isn't about me.
Do you realize what will happen if this situation goes public?
The Senate would be a firestorm--all of our judgments publicly called into question. And General Garza and SpecForce Division would be the first to burn.
Never.
A wise decision.
This is the Senate's fault, not SpecForce's!
That's not fair!
The Senate has done its duty. Garza's recklessness would reignite a war that the Republic cannot win.
Far as I'm concerned, you and Garza can both burn.
Like I care.
You think that you would be spared this reckoning? No, no, you'd be lucky to have a career cleaning refreshers by the end.
I'll admit, I'd like to see the look on that traitor's face when all of her bombs suddenly shut down.
To watch that coward scurry away into the shadows when she realizes that her plans have failed would be priceless!
Rescuing you will reveal my presence to Wraith?
She's going to know?
Surely Wraith's remote will tell her if the bombs are no longer working. Then she'll flee like the coward she is.
She won't escape me for long.
I'll catch her eventually.
I should hope not.
Saving you is costing me an objective--remember that.
You owe me.
Saving me is your objective, Lieutenant.
These bombs need to stay active until I kill Wraith.
I can't let her escape.
Fool! She will detonate these bombs the moment she sees you. I'll be killed!
I'd better just get you out of here. I can track Wraith down later.
You're right, forget it.
You can be reasoned with after all.
Letting you die is tempting, but I'll resist.
I guess I should save you.
How very kind of you.
Wraith has to be stopped--no matter the cost.
So be it.
What? Are you insane? I'm a Senator of the Galactic Republic! If you fail to save my life, you'll be tried for treason! You'll be executed!
Get me out of here, you worthless fool! Get me out of here!
No matter how far Wraith goes, I'll catch her eventually.
Let her run.
In that, you have my full authorization, Lieutenant.
Now get to work on those bombs.
Be quiet and let me work. Sir.
Why are you still talking?
Just be careful, or we're both dead!
Careful! There are bombs everywhere!
Who in blazes are you?
